body.name: Unikito Reversible L Shaped Desk with Magic Power Outlets and USB Charging Ports, Sturdy Corner Computer Desk with Storage Shelves, Gaming Table Home Office Desk, Easy to Assemble, Black
features: 【MAGIC POWER OUTLETS AND USB CHARGING PORTS】 It is cool and extremely helpful that the computer desk comes with a nice inset USB and outlet charging station. The L shaped desk is built in 3 power outlets and 2 USB charging ports. It is a nice touch to provides extra power support for your computer, printer, scanner, phone, tablet, gaming gear etc, which provides a great convenience to your life when you are working, writing or playing games.

【REVERSIBLE L SHAPE & LONG DESK DESIGN】 With reversible design, the office desk is configurable to 3 different ways. It is configured either on the right side, left side or straight long desk as your personal preference, which provides you a fully functional workplace for whatever project you are working on. You can use one side as a work area and other side for gaming or writing area.

【FUNCTIONAL AND STYLISH DESIGN】 With the combination of functional and sleek design, the corner desk not only includes practical performance of modern furniture, but also bring you a nice addition to any room. The storage shelves underneath are great for extra storage and provide enough spaces for storing books, magazines, devices and hosts. That leaves plenty of desk space open to work on.

【STURDY AND ROOMY】The writing desk is made from very thick engineered wood and rugged metal frame that are built to last. It is very sturdy, comfortable, maneuverable and spacious. Its sturdy construction has a excellent load-bearing capacity to support up to 500 lbs, and provide plenty of space for your computer, monitor and still have work room for your remote work and home office. It also can add vitality and style to your workstation and make your room cozy and complete. The adjustable non-slip foot pad also ensure stability on uneven ground.

【MULTIPURPOSE AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE】 This is a great desk for small space. It is not too small nor too big and does not take up much space. The configurable design means it can fits into almost any space and have desk space at both sides for productivity. This desk can sit in a corner, large home office or smaller work nooks as a computer desk, office desk, gaming desk, study desk, work desk. The instruction is easy and straightforward. Putting it together is easy and painless.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether you need more space for gaming setup, remote work and home office or you want to add some extra storage, this desk has it all. With functional and sleek design, the L shaped computer desk creates a very aesthetic look for any room in your home office. It features storage shelves underneath with lots of storage, which are convenient storage for headphones, routers, controllers etc. Saves from cluttering up the top of desk. This piece will fit nicely and match everything in your home office.

The corner desk has a sleek and modern design that is perfect for your gaming room. Whether you're a casual gamer or a professional gamer, this gaming desk has everything you need to take your gaming to the next level.
You will get a power strip with 3 power outlets and 2 fast charging USB ports for your office gadgets. It really comes in handy for daily use.

Functional Storage Shelves Underneath for Extra Storage The under storage rack is a nice touch that increases the overall utility of the desk. You can store certain things on it instead of on the desk for keeping your things organized and convenience usage.

Unikito Reversible Computer Desk with Power Outlet and USB Charging Ports If you're planning on getting an l shaped Desk, a workstation, or one of the gaming desks, this should certainly be the best bang for the buck. It is time to give your home and office a multifunctional and nice look computer desk it deserves. Plenty of space and Space-Saving The reversible l shaped desk can set up in three different configurations. The two side desktop can support multiple monitors, printer, scanner, other equipments. You can able to use free space to work more effectively.The corner desk features a storage shelves underneath and adjustable shelves with roomy compartments to offer extra storage space for books, artworks, magazines, office essentials and hosts, so that your desk is not cluttered with office supplies. Multipurpose The reversible design means it can fits into almost any space and have desk space at both sides for productivity. This desk can sit in a corner, large home office or smaller work nooks as a computer desk, office desk, gaming desk, study desk, executive desk with ample desktop and large storage space. It also can add vitality and style to your workstation and make your room cozy and complete. Sturdy and Easy to Assemble With solid construction, this L shaped office desk is very sturdy, besides, the step by step instructions is easy to follow. Please read the instruction carefully during installation.
Reversible L Shaped Computer Desk is flexible to set up on the left or right l shaped desk, 2 person long office desk for different workplace, which can fit well in small space or large space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good desk, don't abuse it
reviews.reviewText: I bought a second one after setting up the first just because it fit well in my computer room and I could build the second one mirror image of the first. Overall, it's a good desk, don't abuse it as it's not robust and sturdy like your Grandpa's old handmade oak desk, but it functions perfectly. The directions are easy enough to follow. It is just dense powder board, so don't over-torque the screws, just snug and it'll be fine. LEDs are a nice ambiance feature, I don't use them all that often personally, but the surface mounted power strip it probably the most useful thing on this desk; just makes quick access to power easier if you need to charge your phone, plug in a heat gun, charge a drill battery real quick, whatever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The desk is easy to assemble and is very sturdy, it can be used for many purposes and can withstand heavy objects on top of it. The LED lights are very ambient and bright with changes in color and speed using a controller or through a phone app. The many shelves provide additional room for other items which prevents a cluttering work/play space. Unikito, along with it's customer service, is amongst the best in Amazon in my opinion and are very willing to fix any complaints you should have. Highly recommend buying these desks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent Small Desk
reviews.reviewText: I'm stretching a bit to give this 4 stars, but I'm trying to review it on its own, without comparing it to desks I've bought over the last 40 years. This is my first metal assemble-yourself desk. Assembly was fine. Easy to understand instructions. No missing parts. Just make sure to skip to the Option B instructions if you're doing Option B. (Sometimes instructions will give you different directions for Option A and Option B along the way during the build process. These instructions are separate. If you're doing Option B, skip to the middle of the book to find the start of those separate instructions.) The desk is nice. It's smaller than I imagined. None of my laptops will fit on the top shelf as shown in the photos. My monitor stands barely fit without slipping off the edge, and there's no room to put them on an angle. I like the shelf though, so this is just something I need to work on for my personal setup. I suppose you could call it sturdy/solid. It's not as sturdy/solid as a Bush or Sauder wood desk, it has some wobble. However, it's well built, and I don't think it's ever going to fall apart. The screws hold it together well. It's light, so it's easy to move. The metal is a little thin, if you run into it with your office chair the desk might not take it so well. Don't overtighten the screws or you'll bend the metal. The LEDS work, and I like them.Overall, it's not my favorite desk ever, but I like it enough to have ordered another one. I will put the second one together as Option A, and turn them into one big U-shaped desk, which is what I needed to make this work for 2 complete workstations with multiple monitors and all the accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Also great for working from home
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and do not generate paperwork so I didn’t need a bunch of drawers or desktop space.It is a smaller size and I had to get used to that, but it fits perfectly in the corner of my office with the side rolling cart next to it to match. The surface is not smooth so writing directly on top is not advised. The leg space difference is only 36”while seated so if you like to swivel your legs freely to get up from your chair, you will bang your knees until you find your groove! Lesson learned.The top shelves/ledges are only 7” deep so I have my laptop on a tilted stand and it hangs over an inch on both sides but it’s staying in place. I have two 22” monitors placed at the “V”, but there is some wasted space behind so I put a small subwoofer there…not really wasted. My big desktop cpu fits well on the one side and I added another power strip on the shelf below the desk surface (great footrest shelf too but I’m only 5’4”!). The four surface outlets for plugs is great and two USB ports are nice to have for my Bluetooth headphones but the other is needed for the desk gaming lights. No big deal. It’s sturdy and the gaming lights are fun but I just leave one color on and not hooked up to the app. No need for it.I put it together myself with bigger tools than they provide. It took a few hours on a Saturday and I’m overall pleased with it. They provided one additional screw of each type, that was nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am taking more time than I wish to build the desk, but that's my fault. I will update this review when I have assembled the desk and have used it for a while, but at this point I want to emphasize the support I've gotten from Unikito. A screw in one piece didn't go in straight, and I couldn't fix it. I contacted the maker at the emai address in the manual, and after sending address, phone, order number, and photos to confirm which part was at issue, a replacement part will be arriving in about a week.UPDATE: It's finally together, looking good, and more than sturdy enough for my purposes. Things I' learned:If you can at all, assemble it upside down as the manual shows. Not wanting to risk turning it over myself, I assembled it right side up. Mistake. Doing that makes it hard to get all those screws in that connect the desk surface to the frame underneath. I managed, but far better to find someone who can stop by for the minute or two it will take to turn the desk over.The manufacturer means it about waiting to tighten down screws. Live with the wobble until you can get rid of it once and for all.Adequate lighting is your friend when you're looking for screw holes on black metal framework, as well as when you're trying to connect the LED strips to the USB powered device that controls them.
